The most complete and transparent extension to reduce risks when buying minting NFTs.

Ever wondered what's behind the mint page? If the contract is legit? Does it follow best practices? Reduce the tension before blind signing with this extension. üòÖ
With NFTrust you can lower risks before blind signing to any Mint Site and know what is the contract behind it and other collection details.

We believe the NFT ecosystem can be safer with the right technology and data analysis. Allying this, NFTrust checks (among other points):
‚Ä¢ Technical Data:  Is the contract verified in Etherscan? Where is the metadata and image located?
‚Ä¢ Social Data: What is the social reach of the collections? How many followers does it have?
‚Ä¢ Sales Data: What is the sales volume? How many holders does it have?

Blind Signing?
No more surprises when blind signing. Increase your safety using the NFTrust extension before blind signing to any NFT mint site, and quickly check the collection score, on a scale from 0 to 300, based on technical analysis, Sales Data and Social Presence

How does NFTrust work? 
1. Download the extension
2. Open the collection or mint website
3. Click on the extension icon on your browser
4. The ‚Äúwebsite address‚Äù will be automatically fulfilled
5. Click on the ‚Äúrun-scoring‚Äù button
